The Main Language of the Web

HTML stand for Hypertext Markup Language for creating web pages. HTML describe the structure of a web pages , and consists of a series of elements. HTML elements tell the browser how to display the content.

CSS is a Language that describe how HTML elements are to be displayed on screen, paper, or in other media. CSS saves a lots of work, because it can control the layout of multiple web pages all once.

Javascript is the programming Language of HTML and web. Javascript can change CSS. Javascript can hide and show HTML elements, and more.
